dataList.desc:
- Applied Effects:
 • Base Attack Skill Coins and Counter Skill Coins deal more Skill damage, gain Power, and are converted into Unbreakable Coins
 • When hit, does not become Staggered. Minimum HP is fixed to 10
 • Heal HP by a certain percentage of damage dealt with Base Skills
- Units that are killed, cannot be controlled, or immobilized cannot be selected.
dataList.rawDesc: Select a single unit to strengthen its stats.
